name: fast-cut
description: Sistema de Geração Automática de Cortes para Redes Sociais

scripts.check: npm run format && npm run lint && npm run type-check
scripts.clean: python -c "import shutil, glob, os; [os.remove(f) for f in glob.glob('**/*.pyc', recursive=True)]; [shutil.rmtree(d) for d in glob.glob('**/__pycache__', recursive=True) if os.path.isdir(d)]; [shutil.rmtree(d, True) for d in ['build', 'dist'] if os.path.isdir(d)]; [shutil.rmtree(d, True) for d in glob.glob('*.egg-info')]"
